Fort_Wayne.Adams Township, Allen County, Indiana:
Adams Township is one of twenty townships in Allen County, Indiana, United States. As of the 2010 census, its population was 31,816.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, Adams Township covers an area of 32.76 square miles (84.85 km2); of this, 32.75 square miles (84.81 km2) is land and 0.015 square miles (0.04 km2), or 0.05 percent, is water.
